venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
Singers, Songwriters & Musicians!! Come Rock out at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge, pool table, inexpensive drinks. ($2.75 beer $3.75 imported, $3 wine.) Play solo or with backing band or just come to party, network & dance.

All instruments and styles welcome â€“ originals, covers, blues, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Temptations/motown/soul style group singing is especially favored. If you sing and/or play we can back you up with drums, bass, guitar, etc. When RSVPing post your instrument & songs you would like to do.

Crystal Bar VFW across from the Sears Entrance of the Galleria Mall, near Lechmere. 59 1st Street, East Cambridge. Be our guest at the open mike Wed night. Email with questions or to sign up (facilitates an early slot in the line up), or just show up. House band starts at 7PM, rehearsals at 7:30, Main OPen mIke at 8PM. Any further questions email host. This event is linked with 2 other musician groups & other social groups.
item.name: "Girls of Summer" Open Mike Singing, Fun, Pool, Beer and Free Music
